title: Rent to Own in Oak Park. 3 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: 3 spacious bedrooms, 1.1 baths and a dedicated main floor office/ flex room.
100% turn key, with NEW kitchen, NEW main bath, attractive refinished hardwood flooring, NEW HVAC- pluming- electric service!
Newer vinyl windows, 3 dimensional shingle roof, attractive brick exterior.
Good location for enjoying city events, parks, shopping, hospitals and restaurants.
For  Details & Pics Of This Listing***
